FuncDef:
The udp-packet-defend enable command enables defense against UDP packet attacks.
The undo udp-packet-defend enable command disables defense against UDP packet attacks.
By default, defense against UDP packet attack is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When defense against UDP packet attacks is enabled, UDP check is performed on the packets received by the board. The packet that pass UDP check are sent. The packets that fail to pass UDP check are discarded. The packets of which the destination port is 7, 13, or 19 are discarded.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
